EmailTemplate.name: DH_Blast
EmailTemplate.subject: Aviation Portfolio
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Have you ever found yourself wondering if you are always in the right solution?
If the answer is yes, then please consider Aviation Portfolio, an independent market intelligence company. You DON'T need to switch providers for us to make an impact.
Craig Ross, the former COO of Marquis Jet, founded Aviation Portfolio in 2011 to share important information that assures peace of mind in your private travels.
May we schedule a brief, 5-minute introduction?
Warmest Regards,
Daniel Harris Senior Analyst Aviation Portfolio, LLC 3435 Ocean Park Blvd, 107B Santa Monica, CA 90405 310-788-9780 (Office)
Fly Smart. Pay Right.
